info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 18 at 4:43PM PDT until August 18 at 7:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR CENTRAL CLARK COUNTY... At 443 PM PDT, Heavy rainfall has ended across most of central Clark County. Rainfall estiamtes of between 0.5 and 2 inches have fallen earlier between Las Vegas Bay and Black Mountain. Flooding remains possible in low water crossings and washes. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Henderson, Boulder City, Lake Las Vegas, Las Vegas Bay, Railroad Pass, Boulder Beach Campground, Boulder Beach, Las Vegas Bay Campground and Black Mtn. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
